snippet.title: Shadows of the Afterland - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2506100/Shadows_of_the_Afterland/?utm_source=social&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer Add it to your wishlist!
http://eepurl.com/gE2Fy1 Join the newsletter!

You don’t recall your death; you haven’t even been born yet. Cross between realms and possess the living to unearth your haunting past in this supernatural comedy adventure where you'll confront sinister forces to find out if you are merely a pawn of destiny or if you can change your own future.

CREATED BY
Silvia Izquierdo Pombo
Rubén López Gómez

DESIGNED BY
Rubén López Gómez

PRODUCED BY
Silvia Izquierdo Pombo

WRITTEN BY
Rubén López Gómez

SCRIPT CONSULTING
Emilio Almirón

ART DIRECTOR
Emilio Almirón

ART DIRECTION ASSISTANT
Sabrina Riggio

BACKGROUND ART BY
Emilio Almirón
Darius Anton
Antón Yáñez Souto
Carlos González Nieto

CHARACTER DESIGN BY
Emilio Almirón
Antón Yáñez Souto
Carlos González Nieto

ANIMATION BY
Emilio Almirón
Bera Burucu
Isabel Pérez
Daniel Romanenco
 
MUSIC AND SFX
Juan R. Salgueiro Aguirre

TRAILER NARRATION
Eric Gerstein

ENGINE BY
Rubén López Gómez

FONTS
Grand9K Pixel font by Jayvee D. Enaguas
Bangers by Vernon Adams
